Package controller

Class UpdateManager

java.lang.Object
controller.UpdateManager
public class UpdateManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains methods that update associations and compositions When the Course code or Index number details are updated, the List of indexes present in the student object should also be updated

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UpdateManager()
    Constructor for UpdateManager Class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void updateCourseCode​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String newCourseCode)
    Method to check if the course exists in the database and updates the course code of a course object Updates the course code of the index objects which are part of the course and updates the details of indexes in the registered list and waiting list of the student objects
    void updateIndexNumber​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String indexNumber, java.lang.String newIndexNumber)
    Method that checks if the course exists in the database and if the index is part of this course and updates the index number of the index Updates the index number of the index objects in the waiting list and registered list of the student object
    void updateIndexVacancy​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String indexNumber, int vacancy)
    Method that checks if the course exists in the database and if the index is part of this course and updates the vacancy of the index Updates the vacancy of the index objects in the waiting list and registered list of the student object If the vacancy has increased and the waiting list is not empty then the students on waiting list are removed from the wait list and are registered for the course until the vacancy is 0 or the waiting list is empty
    void updateStudentMaxAU​(java.lang.String userName, int maxAU)
    Method that checks if the student exists in the database and updates the maximum allowable aacademic units.
    void updateStudentName​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String name)
    Method that checks if the student exists in the database and updates the student name.
    void updateStudentNationality​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String nationality)
    Method that checks if the student exists in the database and updates the nationality of the student.
    void updateStudentSchool​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String school)
    Method that checks if a student exists in the database and updates the school of the student Updates the student details in the waiting list and registered list of all indexes

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • updateStudentName

      public void updateStudentName​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String name)
      Method that checks if the student exists in the database and updates the student name. Updates the names of students and reflects the changes in the waiting list and registered list of all indexes
      Parameters:
      userName - user name of the student to update
      name - new name of the student to be set

    • updateStudentNationality

      public void updateStudentNationality​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String nationality)
      Method that checks if the student exists in the database and updates the nationality of the student. Updates the nationality of student and reflects the changes in the waiting list and registered list of all indexes
      Parameters:
      userName - user name of the student to update
      nationality - new nationality of the student to be set

    • updateStudentMaxAU

      public void updateStudentMaxAU​(java.lang.String userName, int maxAU)
      Method that checks if the student exists in the database and updates the maximum allowable aacademic units. Updates the student details in the waiting list and registered list of all indexes
      Parameters:
      userName - user name of the student to update
      maxAU - maximum allowable academic credits to be set

    • updateStudentSchool

      public void updateStudentSchool​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String school)
      Method that checks if a student exists in the database and updates the school of the student Updates the student details in the waiting list and registered list of all indexes
      Parameters:
      userName - user name of the student to be updated
      school - school of the student to be set

    • updateCourseCode

      public void updateCourseCode​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String newCourseCode)
      Method to check if the course exists in the database and updates the course code of a course object Updates the course code of the index objects which are part of the course and updates the details of indexes in the registered list and waiting list of the student objects
      Parameters:
      courseCode -
      newCourseCode -

    • updateIndexNumber

      public void updateIndexNumber​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String indexNumber, java.lang.String newIndexNumber)
      Method that checks if the course exists in the database and if the index is part of this course and updates the index number of the index Updates the index number of the index objects in the waiting list and registered list of the student object
      Parameters:
      courseCode - course code to be updated
      indexNumber - index number of the index to be updated
      newIndexNumber - new index number of the index to be set

    • updateIndexVacancy

      public void updateIndexVacancy​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String indexNumber, int vacancy)
      Method that checks if the course exists in the database and if the index is part of this course and updates the vacancy of the index Updates the vacancy of the index objects in the waiting list and registered list of the student object If the vacancy has increased and the waiting list is not empty then the students on waiting list are removed from the wait list and are registered for the course until the vacancy is 0 or the waiting list is empty
      Parameters:
      courseCode - course code of the course to update
      indexNumber - index number of the index to update
      vacancy - new vacancy of the index number to be set
